title: Robert O Blake visits SAARC village to meet MR
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) US Assistant Secretary of State for South and Central Asian Affairs Robert O Blake visited the Sri Lankan House in the SAARC village in Thimpu, Bhutan to meet President Mahinda Rajapaksa ahead of the SAARC Summit. Former US Ambassador for Colombo Mr Blake is…
